Universal Market Making Bot - Distribution Package
=================================================

Core Files:
-----------
✓ market_maker_bot.py     - Main bot application
✓ config_wizard.py        - GUI configuration tool
✓ config.example.json     - Configuration template
✓ requirements.txt        - Python dependencies

Documentation:
--------------
✓ COMPLETE_SETUP_GUIDE.md - Complete setup guide for all platforms
✓ setup_guide.html       - Interactive HTML setup guide
✓ LICENSE                - MIT License

Windows Files:
--------------
✓ start_bot.bat          - Windows bot launcher
✓ configure_bot.bat      - Windows config launcher

Linux/Mac Files:
----------------
✓ start_bot.sh           - Linux/Mac bot launcher
✓ setup_aws.sh           - AWS/VPS setup script

Generated Files (created when you run the bot):
-----------------------------------------------
○ config.json            - Your bot configuration
○ market_maker.log       - Bot activity log
○ venv/                  - Python virtual environment

Total Size: ~50 KB (before dependencies)

After Setup:
- Python dependencies will add ~50-100 MB
- Log files will grow over time
- No other large files are created

Minimum Requirements:
- Python 3.8+
- 100 MB free disk space
- Internet connection
- Exchange API keys
